data.eml:eml: Systematic studies on Pseudomyrmex acacia-ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Pseudomyrmecinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ward, Philip S. (1993): Systematic studies on Pseudomyrmex acacia-ants (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Pseudomyrmecinae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 2: 117-168, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.10150
